attributes.action: The day after UK nightclubs reopen should be a national bank holiday.
attributes.additional_details: Great for the economy, saves everyone from having meetings hungover, we all need a few more summer bank holidays as well, why should August and May have all the fun.
attributes.background:
It's simple, lockdown has been tough, everyone is going to want to go out but not everyone can call in sick or take a day off.
People will need to celebrate and blow off steam. It's been a hard year and both hospitality workers and paying customers deserve a full day to recover.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make June 22nd (or the day after Nightclubs reopen) a bank holiday
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576510
